name: Whispers of silence
description: Dive into the haunting narrative of "Whispers of Silence," a first-person exploration game where every object tells a story, and every note reveals a fragment of the past. You step into the shoes of a friend of Nolan Blackwood, guided by a cryptic invitation back to his home. With no one to greet you but the echoes of your footsteps, you engage in detailed interactions - opening doors, switching lights, inspecting objects, and reading through forgotten notes - to piece together the story of a family.
